    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService, com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.SerializationPolicyProvider, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, JenkemService

    public class JenkemServiceImpl
extends com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
implements JenkemService
    The server side implementation of the RPC service to store and read converted iamges.
